description: Walk straight along the red brick sidewalk, keeping the tram tracks on your left. Continue past the outdoor patio with black metal fencing and striped awnings on your right. The Corner Bakery Cafe is the brick building immediately to your right.
agent_concise_description: Walk straight along the red brick sidewalk, keeping the tram tracks on your left. Continue past the outdoor patio with black metal fencing and striped awnings on your right. The Corner Bakery Cafe is the brick building immediately to your right.
